bibl.title: Excavation and Restoration of the SCA-Islamic Section at the Church Complex of Tall al-Makhzan (Pelusium).
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: SCA, Islamic Section, 1999-2001. Preservation of the great church of Pelusium (probably dedicated to St. Epimachos). - 1. The northern annexes. - 2. The latrine on the western side of the atrium.
AL-TAHER Refaad, Mohammed ABD AL-HAFIZ and Peter GROSSMANN, Excavation and Restoration of the SCA-Islamic Section at the Church Complex of Tall al-Makhzan (Pelusium).
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 41 (2002) pp. 33-39, 3 plans et pll. XI-XII.
